subject: Technology
description: The US government warns of the risk of hackers trying to exploit an internet bug and suggests that users change passwords after sites are patched.

subject: Technology
description: Google will release Google Glass to the general public on 15 April for a single day. Still a prototype, the device will sell for $1,500 (£894).

description: Confusion and a lack of planning were the reasons the BBC's £98.4m Digital Media Initiative failed, according to a report.
